text: Alina Grosu (; born in Chernivtsi, UkraineAlina Grosu) is a Ukrainian singer from the Romanian minority. She released her first studio album in 2000 and has released a total of four albums. Grosu was born in Chernivtsi, Ukraine. She entered the music business after winning in a singing contest. The prize was to record a song in a studio, where she met the singer Iryna Bilyk. They released four albums. After her success in music, she moved to Kyiv for practical reasons. Grosu has participated in singing contests such as Slavianski Bazaar in Vitebsk and Junior Eurovision Song Contest national finals. ==Discography== * 2000 — Разом зі мною * 2002 — Бджілка * 2004 — Море волнуется * 2006 — Я кохана донечка * 2006 — Хочу шалить * 2007 — На 19 этаже * 2010 — Мелом на асфальте * 2018 — Бас ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Chernivtsi Category:Ukrainian female singers Category:Ukrainian pop singers Category:English-language singers from Ukraine Category:Ukrainian-language singers Category:Ukrainian people of Romanian descent Category:Child pop musicians Category:21st-century Ukrainian singers Category:21st-century women singers
title: Alina Grosu
